ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When their brother Nuh said to them, 'Will you not have taqwa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When their brother Noah said to them: "Will you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall when their brother Noah said to them: "Do you have no fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: span class="col">Their brother Noah asked them, "Why do you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When their fellowman Nooh said to them, “Do you not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When their brother Nuh said to them: "Will you not have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When their brother Nuh said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when their brother Noah said to them, 'Will you not be godfearing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When their brother Noah said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you have no fear of God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When their brother Nuh said Unto them: fear ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when Noah, their brother, said to them, ‘Will you not be wary [of Allah]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, their brother Noah said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When their brother Nuh (Noah) said to them: "Will you not fear Allah and obey Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when Noah, their brother, said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Their brother Noah said to them, “Do you not fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:106] when Noah, their brother — [their brother only] in terms of lineage — said to them, ‘Will you not fear?, God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When their brother) their Prophet; he was not their brother in religion but only in kinship (Noah said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)) the worship of other than Allah?
